com.xorprogramming.anim

Class FlashAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • com.xorprogramming.anim.FlashAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class FlashAnimation
extends Animation
    An animation that grows then shrinks. If a percent rest time is given, the animation will rest at the original size until for that percent of the animation duration after the growing and shrinking has completed.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts

      • FlashAnimation

        public FlashAnimation(float percentGrowth,
              float percentRestTime)
        Create a new FlashAnimation object.
        Parameters:
        percentGrowth - The percent growth of the animated object
        percentRestTime - The percent of the animation duration where the animated object with stay at the original size after the growing and shrinking has completed
